name: High School of Memories
description:
Haru Takahashi, a foreign exchange student, travels to Japan for his first year of high school!
With his natural blonde hair and his love for anime and manga, he's ready to live in Japan,
the land of his dreams!

From the priceless friends at school, to the enjoyable family time at home, to the exclusive
JRPG Spirit and Katana... Haru is sure to experience lots of happy memories and an abundance
of exciting and precious moments!

Get ready to watch Haru's journey and reminisce at every turn in the visual novel...

High School of Memories!
